subtitle: Once marinated, these chicken wings have that wonderful sweet and smoky taste associated with barbecue sauce.

method.text: Trim the chicken wings. Prick with a fork all over. Place in a shallow dish.
Gently melt the redcurrant jelly in a small saucepan. Stir in all the remaining ingredients.
Pour the redcurrant jelly mixture over the chicken. Leave to marinate for about 1 days, turning occasionally.
Cook the wings under a preheated grill or on a barbecue for 20-25 min, basting regularly with the marinade, until cooked through. Serve immediately.

title: Barbecued chicken wings
